member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE
member.summary: The EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.xDest
member.summary: Logical x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.yDest
member.summary: Logical y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the destination rectangle.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.xSrc
member.summary: Logical x-coordinate of the lower-left corner of the source device-independent bitmap (DIB).

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.ySrc
member.summary: Logical y-coordinate of the lower-left corner of the source DIB.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.cxSrc
member.summary: Width of the source rectangle, in logical units.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.cySrc
member.summary: Height of the source rectangle, in logical units.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.iUsageSrc
member.summary: Value of the bmiColors member of the structure. The iUsageSrc member can be either the DIB_PAL_COLORS or DIB_RGB_COLORS value.

member.name: EMRSETDIBITSTODEVICE.iStartScan
member.summary: First scan line in the array.
